Q_DESC:
Create a class called Account with the following private data members/ member variables- accountNo(int),name(string-Account holders Name) and Balance(int  current balance)

Include the following public member functions or methods
initializeData() that accepts 3arguments and its return type is void.This function is used to set the values for accountNo, name and balance. The arguments are passed to this function in the same order
deposit() that accepts an integer argument and its return type is void.This function is used to withdraw an amount from the account. If the current balance is less than the amount to be withdrawn, then the message Insufficient Balance should be displayed.
checkBalance() that accepts no arguments and its return type is int. This function is used to return the current balance.
DisplayDetails() that accepts no arguments and its return type is void. This function is used to display the account details
In the main function/method, create an object f type Account and invoke the corresponding methods.

Input 
Line 1 : 3 space separated  enter the account number , enter the name of the account holder, enter the initial balance.
Line 2 :enter deposit.
Line 3:enter withdrawl amount.
Output:-
LINE 1:call  Deposit( ) member  fuction.
LINE 2:call withdraw( ) member function.
LINE 3:call checkBalance() member function.
LINE 4:call displayDetails() member function.

400  pavan  5600
2300
1500
